13640.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>You self righteous bastard!
Why should I yield to those fake heroes?<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13640.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「義賊のヤツらめ……。
　なぜ　このオレが　あの偽善者どもに
　引けを　とらなきゃいけないんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13640.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 의적 놈들…….
　왜 내가 그런 위선자 놈들에게
　번번이 당해야 하냐고!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13640.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>可恶的侠盗们……
为什么我会
比不过那群伪善者呢！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13640.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>那些可惡的義賊……
為什麼我會比不過
那群偽善者啊！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13641.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>You think I'm in the wrong?
Answer me, Gasmon!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13641.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「オレが　間違ってるっていうのか！？
　答えろよ　ギャスモン！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13641.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 내가 틀린 거야!?
　대답해, 개스몬!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13641.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>难道是我错了吗？！
回答我啊，气态魔！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13641.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>難道是我錯了嗎！？
回答我啊，氣態魔！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13642.en:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>There is no need for an answer.
If it is power you desire then you shall
have what you seek.<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13642.ja:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>「答エナド　必要ナイ。
　汝ハ　求メレバ　得ラレルノダ。
　ソノ欲望コソガ　汝ノ　ちから……。<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13642.ko:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>: 대답 따윈 필요 없다.
　넌 바라기만 하면 얻을 수 있다.
　그 욕망이야말로 네 힘이니까…….<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13642.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>你需要的不是答案。
你只要想要的话就会得到。
欲望即是汝之力量……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13642.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>你需要的不是答案。
只要追求就能得到。
慾望即是汝之力量……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13643.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>Heh, I see. Then give me the power to
control more monsters than I have now!
I'm going to build the brigade beyond its limits!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13643.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「へへっ　そうか。それじゃあ
　今よりも　強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！
　旅団を　もっと　でかくしてやるんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13643.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 헤헤, 그래? 그럼 지금보다 더
　강한 마물을 부릴 수 있는 힘을 줘!
　여단을 더 크게 키우겠어!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13643.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>嘿嘿，这样啊。那么
快给我能操纵更强怪物的力量！
我要让旅团更加壮大！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13643.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>嘿嘿，這樣啊。
那就快給我能操縱更強怪物的力量！
我要讓旅團更加壯大！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13644.en: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>You already have the power to control monsters... Is that not enough for you?<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13644.ja:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>「マタ　魔物ヲ　操ルちからカ……。
　ソロソロ　汝自身　強クナル
　必要ガ　アルノデハ　ナイカ……？<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13644.ko:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>: 또 마물을 부리는 힘인가…….
　이제는 너 자신이 강해질
　필요가 있지 않은가……?<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13644.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>你怎么还想要操纵怪物的力量……
你也差不多
该让自身变强了吧？<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13644.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>怎麼還想要操縱怪物的力量……
你也差不多
該讓自身變強了吧……？<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13645.en: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>You also have the power to end this terror.<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13645.ja: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>「ソノ手デ　憎シミヲ　断ツタメニ……。<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13645.ko: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>: 그 손으로 증오를 끊기 위해…….<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13645.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>为了亲手报仇……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13645.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>為了親手斷絕憎恨……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13646.en:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>It shouldn't take a sage telling you that
to get through to you...<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13646.ja:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>「ホウラ……。ソノコトヲ告ゲル
　使者ガ　来タヨウダ……。<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13646.ko:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>: 보아라……. 그 사실을 전할
　사자가 온 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13646.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>哦……似乎是想要
告诉你这件事的使者来了……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13646.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>你看……要告訴你這件事的使者
似乎來了……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13647.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>What are you doing here? I hope you're
not thinking of trying to set me
straight or something.<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13647.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「何しにきやがった。
　オレを　正しい道に進ませようとか
　ふざけたこと　考えてんじゃねえだろうな。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13647.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 뭐 하러 온 거야?
　날 올바른 길로 이끌겠다느니 하는
　허튼 짓거리를 생각하는 건 아니겠지?<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13647.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>你来干什么啊。
你该不会是想劝我
走上正道吧。别开玩笑了！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13647.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>你來幹什麼啊。
該不會是想勸我
走上正道吧，別開玩笑了。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13648.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>Tsk tsk tsk! You have the guilt-ridden eyes
of a false hero! Don't you know what my
father did?<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13648.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「チッ！　親父と同じ　偽善者の目……。
　その目を見てると　むしずが走るぜ！
　アンタ　親父が何したか　知ってんのかよ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13648.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 쳇! 아버지와 똑같은 위선자의 눈이군…….
　그 눈만 보면 구역질이 나!
　당신은 우리 아버지가 무슨 짓을 했는지 알아!?<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13648.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>嘁！和老爸一样，伪善者的眼神……
我看到这种眼神就觉得恶心！
你知道我老爸做了什么吗？！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13648.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>呿！和老爸一樣，偽善者的眼神……
我看到這種眼神就覺得噁心！
你知道我老爸做了什麼嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13649.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>The day Mucho robbed the mayor's
house, my mother was on the verge of
death after years of illness.<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13649.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「ムーチョが　町長の家に盗みに入った日……
　オレの母さんは　生死の境を　さまよっていた。
　……何年も続いた　大病の果てにな。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13649.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 무초가 촌장의 집에 숨어든 날……
　내 어머니는 사경을 헤매고 계셨다.
　……몇 년째 앓고 있던 중병 때문이었지.<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13649.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>姆乔在镇长家行窃的那天……
我妈妈正在生死间徘徊。
……她那持续多年的重病终于爆发了。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13649.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>姆喬在鎮長家行竊的那天……
我的母親正在生死間徘徊。
……她那持續多年的重病終於爆發了。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13650.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>We were poor. We had no money to buy
medicine. Then Mucho came to our house
with the mayor's treasure. I was so excited...<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13650.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「うちは　貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。
　そんなとき　町長の財宝を持ったムーチョが
　うちに来たのさ。オレは　小おどりしたね！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13650.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 우리 집은 가난해서 약을 살 돈조차 없었어.
　그런데 그때 촌장의 재보를 든 무초가
　우리 집에 온 거야. 난 뛸 듯이 기뻐했지!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13650.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>我家很穷，根本就没钱买药……
在这种时候，拿着镇长家财宝的姆乔
到我家来了，我还真是吓一跳呢！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13650.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>我家很窮，根本就沒錢買藥……
在這種時候，拿著鎮長家財寶的姆喬
到我家來了，我還很雀躍呢！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13651.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>But you know what? Mucho, took the riches
and left instead of helping. He abandoned
her in her time of need!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13651.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「……けどよ！　ムーチョは……
　親父は　母さんの　まくらもとに立っても
　何も置いていかずに　去っていったんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13651.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: ……하지만! 무초는……
　아버지는 어머니의 머리맡에 서더니
　아무것도 두지 않고 그냥 떠났어!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13651.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>但是啊！姆乔他……
老爸他看着躺在床上的妈妈，
却什么都没有留下就走了！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13651.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>……可是！姆喬他……
老爸他看著躺在床上的媽媽，
卻什麼都沒有留下就走了！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13652.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>Mom died the next day. My father
cried, but looking back now, I'm sure
those were crocodile tears...<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13652.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「次の日に　母さんは　死んだよ。
　親父は泣いてたが　今思えば　あのときの涙も
　うそっぱちだったに　ちがいねえ。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13652.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 어머니는 다음 날 돌아가셨다.
　아버지는 눈물을 흘렸지만, 지금 생각해 보면
　그 눈물도 가짜였던 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13652.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>第二天，妈妈就死掉了。
老爸虽然哭了，但是现在想想，
那一定是装的。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13652.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>隔天媽媽就死掉了。
老爸雖然哭了，但是現在想想，
那一定是裝的。<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13653.en:
I left home, swearing revenge on Mucho. Then I met Gasmon here and gained the power to control
monsters!
13653.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「オレは　ムーチョへの復讐を誓い　家を出た。
　……そして　ここにいるギャスモンと出会い
　魔物を操るチカラを　手に入れたのさ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13653.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 난 무초에게 복수하기로 맹세하고 집을 나왔다.
　……그리고 여기 있는 개스몬과 만나
　마물을 부리는 힘을 손에 넣었지!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13653.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>我发誓要向姆乔报仇而离开了家乡。
……然后，在这里遇到了气态魔，
得到了操纵怪物的力量！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13653.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>我發誓要向姆喬報仇而離開了家鄉。
……然後，在這裡遇到了氣態魔，
得到了操縱怪物的力量！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13654.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>A lone thief is nothing more than a mere
scoundrel. So I formed something more...
I formed the Whirlwind Brigade!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13654.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「盗賊なんて　しょせん悪党……。
　そのことを　世間に教えてやるために
　つむじ風の旅団を　結成したんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13654.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 의적도 본질은 도둑일 뿐…….
　난 그 사실을 온 세상에 알리기 위해
　회오리바람 여단을 결성한 거다!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13654.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>盗贼什么的都是恶徒……
我为了让世人明白这件事
而组织了旋风旅团！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13654.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>盜賊什麼的都是惡徒……
我為了讓世人明白這件事
而組織了旋風旅團！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13655.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>But I don't need the Whirlwind Brigade
anymore... I'll kill you all myself!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13655.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「でもよ……　もう　つむじ風の旅団なんて
　まわりくどいことは　やめるぜ。
　オレは　貴様らを　直接　皆殺しにしてやる！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13655.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 이제 회오리바람 여단 같은
　번거로운 방법은 관두겠어.
　난 내 손으로 직접 네놈들을 처단할 거다!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13655.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>但是啊……我已经不想再干
旋风旅团这种费劲的事情了。
我要把你们全杀掉！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13655.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>可是……我已經不想再幹
旋風旅團這種拐彎抹角的事了。
我要親自殺掉你們所有人！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13656.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>Give me the power! Give me the power
to crush my enemies!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13656.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「ギャスモン！　さあ　オレにチカラをくれ！
　こいつらを　ひねりつぶすための
　絶大なチカラを……！！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13656.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>: 개스몬! 자, 나에게 힘을 줘!
　이놈들을 짓밟을 수 있을 만큼
　강대한 힘을……!!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13656.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>气态魔！快，赐予我力量吧！
赐予我能够捏碎他们的
强大的力量！！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13656.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>氣態魔！快，賜予我力量吧！
賜予我能捏碎他們的
強大力量……！！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13657.en: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>Svetha does not desire this...<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13657.ja: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>「スベテハ　欲望ノ　オモムクママニ……。<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13657.ko: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>: 모든 것은 욕망이 이끄는 대로…….<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13657.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>一切都照你的欲望实现…………<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13657.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m07402 _normal m00001>一切都照你的慾望實現……<stop_lip_animation m07402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13658.en:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>Ahhh yes! I can feel the power!!
The power of darkness!!!<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13658.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01403 _normal m00001>「おお……　みなぎる　みなぎるぞ！！！
　黒いチカラが　オレの身体に………ッ！！！<stop_lip_animation n01403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
